comments:
I20040521-1200 build on RedHat9.0
I have checked out project from CVS, switched to java perspective, launched
help, exited and found following in the log:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 May 21, 2004 13:21:33.938
!MESSAGE Unhandled event loop exception

Thius is because the opening of this dialog is being blocked by the modal 
dialg and it is using the modal dialog as a potential parent. We need to 
review the use of the isUser call and the grabbing of a shell.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 64362 ***
